oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Controllability properties of a planar 3R underactuated manipulator
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: MAHINDRAKAR, AD
BANAVAR, RN
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: mechanical systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper we present a few controllability properties of a three link planar, horizontal underactuated manipulator with three revolute joints (3R) and two control inputs. The controllability analysis is presented for various actuator configurations. In particular, it is shown that the system is small time locally controllable (STLC) for all except one of the configurations.
